pred: During the meeting, it was discussed that there were three types of speech overlap events: speaker overlap, where two or more people spoke at the same time; overlap from a previous speaker, where a speaker continued speaking after another speaker had started; and overlap from a following speaker, where a speaker started speaking before another speaker had finished. It was also mentioned that these overlap events could be detected by looking for energy in the audio signal at the same time from multiple microphones. Additionally, it was suggested that the time duration and frequency of these overlap events could be analyzed for research purposes.
answers: Efforts by speaker mn005 are in progress to detect overlapping speech. For a single transcribed meeting, speaker mn005 reported approximately 300 cases of overlap. Future work will involve manually deriving time marks from sections of overlapping speech for the same meeting, and then experimenting with different measures, e.g. energy increase, to determine a set of acoustically salient features for identifying speaker overlap.
